solution_line_template: She uses {ounces_beans_per_day} ounces of beans per day because {cups_per_day} x {ounces_per_cup} = <<{cups_per_day}*{ounces_per_cup}={ounces_beans_per_day}>>{ounces_beans_per_day}
She uses {ounces_beans_per_week} ounces of beans per week because {days_per_week} x {ounces_beans_per_day} = <<{days_per_week}*{ounces_beans_per_day}={ounces_beans_per_week}>>{ounces_beans_per_week}
She buys {bags_per_week} bags of beans per week because {ounces_beans_per_week} / {ounces_per_bag} = <<{ounces_beans_per_week}/{ounces_per_bag}={bags_per_week}>>{bags_per_week}
She spends ${cost_beans_per_week} on the beans per week because {bags_per_week} x {cost_per_bag} = <<{cost_beans_per_week}={cost_beans_per_week}>>{cost_beans_per_week}
She spends ${cost_milk_per_week} on the milk per week because {cost_gallon_milk} x ({milk_fraction_used}) = <<{cost_gallon_milk}*({milk_fraction_used})={cost_milk_per_week}>>{cost_milk_per_week}

She spends ${total_cost_per_week} per week on her coffee because {cost_beans_per_week} + {cost_milk_per_week} = <<{cost_beans_per_week}+{cost_milk_per_week}={total_cost_per_week}>>{total_cost_per_week}
